title: Markdown
description: An MDX post testing all markdown elements and react components.
author: Rajbir Johar

body.raw:
# Heading 1

## Heading 2

### Heading 3

#### Heading 4

##### Heading 5

###### Heading 6

**bold text**

_italicized text_

> blockquote

<cite>— Author</cite>

1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

- First item
- Second item
- Third item

`code`

<s>The world is flat.</s>

I need to highlight these <mark>very important words</mark>.

[link](https://rajbir.io/journals/mdx)

```
{
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Smith",
    "age": 25
}
```

He stretched, allowing his eyes to peer over the open window.
The wind was strong as always. A blue and yellow kite in hand,
he struggled onto the warm beach underneath him and threw the kite.
The kite sliced through the clouds, yanked by the thin string
intertwined between his fingers. The seagulls trailed along the
boy, splashing through the wet sand. The sun beat down onto his
naked back as he reeled his kite in. Emptying a bucket full of
dried seaweed from yesterday's adventures, he embarked on his
journey to conquer the tiny shred of land and establish a magnificent
sandcastle and fortify the moat. He sat on the sandy throne
content and innocent.

<cite>— Rajbir Johar 2018</cite>

---

<Image
  src="/journals/hello-world/index.jpg"
  alt="My self portrait."
  caption="This is a self portrait. Considering it was in downtown, I had to get over the embarrassment of taking my own photo. Luckily someone told me that it was super creative."
/>

`,(0,t.jsxDEV)(a.p,{children:`He stretched, allowing his eyes to peer over the open window.
The wind was strong as always. A blue and yellow kite in hand,
he struggled onto the warm beach underneath him and threw the kite.
The kite sliced through the clouds, yanked by the thin string
intertwined between his fingers. The seagulls trailed along the
boy, splashing through the wet sand. The sun beat down onto his
naked back as he reeled his kite in. Emptying a bucket full of
dried seaweed from yesterday's adventures, he embarked on his
journey to conquer the tiny shred of land and establish a magnificent
sandcastle and fortify the moat. He sat on the sandy throne
content and innocent.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/rajbir/Projects/alpine-v2/data/journals/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-7048fa38-ad9e-4774-a4b8-359bccfbec7c.mdx",lineNumber:56,columnNumber:1},this),`
